captions: A yellow dog lies down under a large tree at the edge of the field.
It walks along a narrow dirt path surrounded by wildflowers.
It naps in a patch of sunlight near a flowerbed.
It wanders by a small river with lots of trees around it.
audio: A gentle breeze rustles through the tree leaves.
The soft padding of dog paws on a dirt path surrounded by gentle rustling of grass and wildflowers in a light breeze.
Soft rustling of leaves in a gentle breeze
A stream flows and a dog panting
